tests.name: test
tests.setup: python3 -m venv venv; source venv/bin/activate; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; python -m pip install markdown pytest;

tests.name: other test
tests.setup:
python3 -m venv venv; source venv/bin/activate; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; python -m pip install markdown pytest;echo 'import markdown 
def test_section_author(): 
	md_fp = "README.md" 
	with open(md_fp,) as f: 
		markdown_string = f.read() 
	html_string = markdown.markdown(markdown_string,).lower() 
	assert "author" in html_string[-300:]' > test_section.py
